WorkshopItemInfo.Name: One Step from The Last Airbender
WorkshopItemInfo.Description:
THIS MOD REQUIRES MORE LUA POWER TO FUNCTION PROPERLY!
Introducing some of the main characters from Avatar The Last Airbender to the world of One Step From Eden.
Including: Aang the Airbender Katara the Waterbender Toph the Earthbender Zuko the F
